nodes.text: The AS23 aerial survey droid was a flying droid used for airborne exploring. It was manufactured by Arakyd Industries.

The AS23 was triangular and streamlined. It was designed to easily slip through the atmosphere while it performed its duties. Its shape was reminiscent of a wide variety of airborne predators, which often caused the local wildlife to leave it alone during missions. It cost 23,500 credits new.

It had a sophisticated automap sensor package that allowed it to make topographical maps, even in total darkness. Information could be stored in the droid's databanks, or transmitted back to the owner via a comlink.
The AS23 could also be employed as an aerial spotter for artillery.
